body: I cannot reproduce this with current rustc. Can you?

I can't using `rustc 1.3.0 (9a92aaf19 2015-09-15)`, I could only reproduce it using an old rustc version I had lying around: `rustc 1.0.0-beta.4 (850151a75 2015-04-30) (built 2015-04-30)`. It must have been fixed along the way.

I just realized I forgot to add the backtrace to my original post so here it is for posterity:
